Poio API Module - txtrawfile.py¶

This module is to create the raw txt file form the pickle file.

Note: The comments are exactly the sames for each on of the types of data hierarchies.

class txtrawfile.CreateRawFile(filepath)[source]¶

Class responsible to create a raw file from the Annotation Tree.

There are created to files. One of them is a txt file that is the data from the AnnotationTree file converted to text and the other file is a xml that contain the regions of each sentence in the txt file.

Methods

create_raw_file()[source]¶

Creates an txt file with the data in the Annotation Tree file. Passing only the sentences.

See also

create_raw_xml
Function the converts the data

to

create_raw_xml()[source]¶

Creates an xml file with the regions of the data in the Annotation Tree file.

See also

create_raw_file
Function the converts the data

to, Tree
